posts.name: Woody
posts.content: Terriers are the best because they are super smart, active, and get along with other dogs.

posts.name: Martin
posts.content: I love this absolute chiller. Adopted him from a shelter and he's basically self trained. 100% best dog ever.

posts.name: Wasabi
posts.content: Wasabi got her name from her love of sushi. She's had so much that at this point, she'll turn her nose up to anything thats not sashimi grade.

comments.content: I'm not sure dogs should have sushi...
